divs: Sighting DetailsI did not see a UFO in the air. I awoke and a shadow caught my attention. At first I thought it was my eyes, I'm 31 and have never been so freaked out in my life. My dog never barked or alerted me. I'm not even sure why I woke up. When I blinked s everal domes and rubbed my eyes I realized I was seeing something. My windows are low so the figure could not have been more than 4ft tall. It was a shadow of a head, larger than a human head and a little skinny neck and shoulders (a bust) that's all I could see. It moved so slowly that, I got the chills. In the other window (we have 5in our master) there was a tall super skinny shadow that slightly made a "y" at the top. As soon as the shadowy figure moved away from the window I hit my husband so hard and (do not to sound completely nuts) I told him someone was outside. He turned on all the lights and grabbed his gun.... :( and ten minutes later, we checked outside and nothing. When we went back to bed I laid there looking for the shadows, but they were both gone. I didn't really go back to sleep and I can't figure out what it was. Help please.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There was one other sighting in Abilene on or around June 2nd 2012
Summary: not a ufo but a figure.
